mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ARTICLE ( USER_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, LIKES_COUNT, READS_COUNT, WRITE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{title}, #{contents}', 0, 0, CURDATE() )
